Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
Backend server connecting to external PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
User registration functionality with account creation
Article browsing interface organized by categories
Search functionality to find articles by keywords
Article collection feature allowing users to save favorites
Article sharing capability to external platforms
Reading history tracking for logged-in users
User profile management for collection and history access
Responsive layout styled with old lace background and rosy brown interface elements
Package.json configured with 'install:all' script for simultaneous frontend and backend dependency installation
Package.json configured with 'dev' script to run frontend and backend concurrently
Database schema supporting users, articles, categories, collections, and reading history
API endpoints for user authentication, article retrieval, search, and user-specific data management
